body: It works fine. You were connecting the image from the run daylight component to the image viewer instead of FalseColor. Also you should not adjust the exposure for a false color image. If you need to do so, do it before generating the false color. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/S6s2Mu0DvER56gd*ofeEPC3M1o99s8Otc5mPuNNI7548VPnz1f9OLRi2gd*44GMDoWVQ7ssxX3HDFE3VVldkfIl48Q6u-u83/falsecolor.png)
